oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-01-26 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 26, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performer Autry Inman, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Dale Potter, the Jordanaires, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Del Wood; Minnie Pearl; Rod Brasfield; Autry Inman; Chet Atkins; Faron Young
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Just Because (Del Wood) [continued from part 1] -- Faron Young introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Rod Brasfield) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Faron Young) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Faron Young introduces Autry Inman -- Blue Monday (Autry Inman) -- Faron Young introduces Chet Atkins -- When My Sugar Walks Down The Street (Chet Atkins) -- Faron Young talks -- I Miss You Already (And You're Not Even Gone) (Faron Young) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Faron Young) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Potter, Dale; Young, Faron; Inman, Autry
